title: _space.jsonc Schema
description: Schema for validating the _space.jsonc configuration file in Envoyr.

$schema.description: The URI / file path of the JSON schema for the _space.jsonc file.

dependencies.description: List of dependencies for the space. Each dependency can be a string or an object with additional configuration.

oneOf.description: A string representing the path to a dependency.
An object representing a dependency with additional options.

name.description: The path to the dependency, relative or absolute.

template.description: A template string for renaming variables from the dependency. Use `{}` as a placeholder for the variable name.

keys.description: List of specific keys (variables) to include from the dependency.

environments.description: List of environments supported by the space.

mapping.description: Mappings of environments from this space to environments in dependencies.

from.description: The source environment name in the current space.

to.description: The target environment name in the dependency.
